title: Project build should log which evaluation id corresponds to this project
body:
A given project may be evaluated more than once and each evaluation will have a unique id. Events such as "ProjectImported" are reported under a specific evaluation.

When a project starts building, I don't see a correlation between this project and its evaluation. I'd like to see which evaluation id was used to build this project.

This is needed to display an accurate "preprocess" view of a project, to only include the actual project imported events that were used in the evaluation for this project.

Probably just log a message at the beginning of a project build "Evaluation id being used: 42"
